name: Pirate Scramblers - a tile puzzle of scallywags and sea dogs
name_original: Pirate Scramblers - a tile puzzle of scallywags and sea dogs
description:
Ahoy me puzzlin' hearties! Solve more than 30 pirate picture puzzles and plunder the leaderboards!

Tap two tiles to swap them. Tap a tile twice to rotate it!

How quickly can you reassemble the pictures?
